text:
Larger than life sets, Alia's perfect Kathak Moves and Madhuri Dixit Nene's 'Nazakat' makes Kalank's first song an absolute delight to watch.
Dharma
After creating the right amount of hype and buzz around the song, Dharma Productions dropped the song today on social media networks.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Sung by Shreya Ghoshal and Vaishali Mhade, the song is a visual spectacle.
Dharma Productions
However, the song can't be compared to a Dola Re Dola or Pinga because only Alia Bhatt is seen dancing in the video and viewers are definitely going to miss watching Madhuri dance!
The lyrics of the song have been penned down by Amitabh Bhattacharya and the music is by Pritam. Remo D'Souza has choreographed the number. Alia Bhatt took to Twitter to thank the whole team for putting everything together so brilliantly for the song. Read the tweets!
Dada, @ipritamofficial, I know I troubled you lots for this song. But I love you. Fan for life #GharMorePardesiya — Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) March 18, 2019
A huge thank you to @shreyaghoshal and #VaishaliMhade for their beautiful voices that brought #GharMorePardesiya to life ❤ A very special thank you to @OfficialAMITABH whose words created the magic. I can’t stop listening to it https://t.co/Lerpmqz3sW — Alia Bhatt (@aliaa08) March 18, 2019
Without further ado, watch the song right here.
title: Alia's Kathak, Madhuri's 'Nazakat' Is Making Kalank's 'Ghar More Pardesiya' A Delight To Watch!
description: Sung by Shreya Ghoshal and Vaishali Mhade, the song is a visual spectacle. However, the song can't be compared to a Dola Re Dola or Pinga because only Alia Bhatt is seen dancing in the video and viewers are definitely going to miss watching Madhuri dance!
